message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $15,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $11,000 at this time.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. Let's see if we can find common ground there.
